== eduPerson Attribute Definitions ==

eduPersonPrimaryAffiliation (SAML 2:urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.5923.1.1.1.6)

eduPersonPrimaryAffiliation specifies the person's PRIMARY relationship to the institution in broad categories such as student, faculty, staff, alum, etc.

eduPersonPrimaryAffiliation is a single-valued string attribute.

 * faculty
 * staff
 * employee
 * student
 * member
 * affiliate
